DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the application to read tenant-wide print settings on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the application to read tenant-wide print settings on your behalf.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to read tenant-wide print settings without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write tenant-wide print settings
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the application to read and write tenant-wide print settings on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read and write tenant-wide print settings
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the application to read and write tenant-wide print settings on your behalf.
